medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has experienced RLQ abdominal pain since this morning, which is constant and worsens with movement. This is the first occurrence of such pain. The last bowel movement was normal, and symptoms are accompanied by chills. Denies nausea, vomiting, or fever.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA), mother died of stroke
